caption.title: Relationship between age-specific DENV seroprevalence and clinically severe dengue disease in different countries.
caption.p: (A) Age-specific DENV seroprevalence and proportion of severe dengue among total dengue cases in each age group in Sanmin and Nanzih districts of Kaohsiung City based on this study. (B) Age-specific DENV seroprevalence and incidence of severe dengue in Singapore, based on previous studies conducted between 2005 and 2010 [ 33, 52, 53]. (C) Age-specific DENV seroprevalence in school children and proportion of DSS among pediatric dengue hospitalizations in southern Vietnam, based on previous studies conducted between 2001 and 2009 [ 46, 51].
